DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study determine effect investigational product consume meal serum lipid , primarily LDL cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Lipid-lowering Effect Plant Stanol Ester Supplement Product
DOC.criteria: male female 18 year old serum LDL cholesterol > 3.0 mmol/L BMI < 35 subject must voluntarily sign informed consent subject use lipid lower medication ( ezetimibe , bile acid sequestrant , statin therapy ) subject hepatic renal disorder accord medical history subject history myocardial infarction unstable angina pectoris within six month prior screen subject history coronary artery bypass graft percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty within six month prior screen subject history temporal ischemic attack stroke within six month prior screen subject history cancer malignant disease within past five year subject consume 15 portion alcohol / week subject pregnant lactating subject use cholesterollowering food dietary supplement within 14 day start intervention subject intolerance ingredient test product
